author: Barnini Chakraborty
title: China defends World Health Organization after Trump slams agency, floats funding freeze
description: China's propaganda machine on Wednesday mounted a furious defense of the World Health Organization (WHO) less than 24 hours after President Trump slammed the global agency and threatened to pull millions of dollars in U.S. funding.
content:
